revised_title: Impact of Local Attraction on Geodetic Measurements and Earth's Figure Determination
tldr: The author discusses the impact of local attraction on geodetic measurements and the determination of the Earth's figure. They propose a method to obtain the mean figure of the Earth free from ambiguity by comparing the Anglo-Gallic, Russian, and Indian arcs. The author also speculates on the constitution of the Earth's crust based on these calculations.
